column4: hey im totally new to linux, im on CLI and want to know if its possible to toggle some sort of status messages, i.e. if i "rm" a file, that there is a message like "blah deleted successfully" ... its kind of weird that there is no response =)
you can add &> /dev/null to supress output from the command
ls -l will list permissions in the first column, user-group-world
